headerButton.name: Add Job Card
headerButton.customHtml:
Add Job Card
Job Card Name Job Card name is required. Label Select Machine -- None -- {{device.name}} Machine selection is required.
Job Card Attributes
Shift Name Shift A Shift B Shift C Shift D Part Name Part A Part B Part C Part D Plant Name Plant A Plant B Plant C Plant D Line Location Line A Line B Line C Line D Target Qty (pcs) Shift Start Time Shift Hours Min Benchmark (%)
